sourceDesc.p: Sample encoding based on the scanned pages and on Dilemmi’s critical edition.

projectDesc.p: Sample digital scholarly edition presenting three autonomous versions (Q, 1505, 1553), transcribed from the incipit of Book I up to the second poetic section. The 1505 dedicatory letter is encoded as a separate paratextual unit.

editorialDecl.p: The texts are aligned by macro-textual units (Prose 1 → Verses 1 → Prose 2 → Verses 2). A selective negative critical apparatus may be used to record significant divergences.
